name: The Nightcrawler
description:
A new horror game involving.. Nightcrawler

(THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT)

/////////////////////QUICK NOTICE////////////////////

If you're wondering, this is a horror, escape game obviously stated in the trailer says that no this isn't a furry game inspite of the main character being a cat-like creature so if you were expecting that, this game is not a furry game just a horror escape game.

For recording it is recommended to download the game.

////////////////////DESCRIPTION/////////////////////////

It's night, you're locked within a house where a monster is found. Can you find all the switches that can open the door? or be stuck in the house where the Nightcrawler resides..

////////////////////CONTROLS///////////////////////////

Click - Interact

1 - 4 - Item Slots

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Use Item

/////////////////////////TIPS//////////////////////////

- When you see the Nightcrawler in the room. Run!

- Coins gives you extra points when collected!

- Neon Objects excluding screens emit too much light!

////////////////ENDINGS////////////////////////////////

The Good Ending - Successfully exit the house!

The Bad Ending - Die to the Nightcrawler

The True Ending - ???
